name: Word Master - Best Puzzle Game
description:
FREE forever! The KING of BRAIN Games!
Do you like challenge?Word Master is a very fun and exciting word puzzle game！

The aim of the game is to find all hidden words.
With this game you can easily improve your vocabulary, concentration and spelling skills.
It has the most modern and innovative quiz tips, not old-fashioned spelling.

HOW TO PLAY
• Words can be assembled in any direction.
• Simply swipe your finger over a word to select it.
• If you've found a valid word it will remain highlighted and marked on the word list as found.

FEATURES
• Discover hidden words from mixed letters.
• Find derived words from main words and develop your brain & vocabulary skills.
• Explore BONUS words to get additional rewards.
• Feel achievement with Increased point by making more cakes!
• Daily bonus rewards.
• Great exercise for the brain.
• Support both Phones and Tablets.
• OFFLINE or ONLINE

If you are a big fan for word games, don’t hesitate to try our game! We promise to make the most unforgettable game experience for you!
developers: 上海简趣网络科技有限公司广州分公司
